sentences.en: Find your passion, and pursue it doggedly.
sentences.cn: 找到你所热爱的, 顽强地追求它.

sentences.en: For a time he tried doggedly to see into the place.
sentences.cn: 他有一阵非要往里边望望清楚不可.

sentences.en: He ran doggedly around the far corner, arms pumping at his sides, and into the straightaway.
sentences.cn: 他锲而不舍地从最外圈的角落绕过来, 手臂在他的两侧挥动着, 跑入了直道.

sentences.en: He trudged doggedly on until he reached the flat.
sentences.cn: 他顽强地、步履艰难地走着,一直走回了公寓.

sentences.en: She stood doggedly in checkout lines; she toiled like a dray - horse up the Hill back home.
sentences.cn: 她顽强地支撑着排在付款的队里; 她像拖载重物的老马艰难地爬上山回家.

sentences.en: They failed, but they doggedly kept at it.
sentences.cn: 他们失败了, 但他们顽强地坚持了下来.

sentences.en: They fought doggedly but fell short on flexible tactics.
sentences.cn: 他们打得很顽强,但灵活性较差.

sentences.en: Those who immerse themselves in scientific research and work at it doggedly should be encouraged.
sentences.cn: 有的人一头钻到科研里面埋头苦干,应当鼓励.

sentences.en: We must stick doggedly to this undertaking and not delay its fulfilment by a single day.
sentences.cn: 这件事情一定要死扭住不放,一天也不能耽误.
